name: Saw Horror
description:
A trap game similar to the movie saw.

A tense game in which you find yourself chained up in a mysterious laboratory, filled with deadly traps and obstacles that you must overcome to escape.

With only your wits and agility to rely on, you must navigate through a series of rooms, each containing unique challenges designed to test your survival skills.

But be careful, every wrong move could lead to a painful and gruesome end.

Can you outsmart the twisted mastermind behind this game and make it out alive?

The clock is ticking, and your life is on the line in Saw Lab.

Gameplay Video
